name: Bea's Pollen Putting
description:
Bea has been eyeballing those Mac & Cheesedogs for so long that it took a bit too long to realize they were for a golf competition!  However, Bea, being the big, stubborn chunkster she is, will not let anything get between her and a very tasty snack.  So that is how the story begins.

Golf in various locations such as Newport, Brooklyn, Bennington.  And someday take your golfing skills to some less conventional places, like the ChaoThix world!

The game  will have *gulp* "free DLC" as time progresses with new modes, gimmicks, and courses.
